gandalf = [10, 11, 13, 30, 22, 11, 10, 33, 22, 22]
saruman = [23, 66, 12, 43, 12, 10, 44, 23, 12, 17]

spells = len (gandalf)
print ("They are", spells, "total spells")

gandalf = [10, 11, 13, 30, 22, 11, 10, 33, 22, 22]
saruman = [23, 66, 12, 43, 12, 10, 44, 23, 12, 17]

spells = len (gandalf)
print ("They are", spells, "total spells")

gandalf_wins = 0
saruman_wins = 0 

for i in gandalf:
    print (i)

for k in saruman:
    print (k)

outputs.name: stdout
text:
They are 10 total spells
saruman wins

source:
gandalf = [10, 11, 13, 30, 22, 11, 10, 33, 22, 22]
saruman = [23, 66, 12, 43, 12, 10, 44, 23, 12, 17]

spells = len (gandalf)
print ("They are", spells, "total spells")

gandalf_wins = 0
saruman_wins = 0

if gandalf [0] > saruman [0]:
    print ("gandalf wins")

else:
    print ("saruman wins")

outputs.name: stdout
text: (False, False, True, False, True, True, False, True, True, True)

gandalf = [10, 11, 13, 30, 22, 11, 10, 33, 22, 22]
saruman = [23, 66, 12, 43, 12, 10, 44, 23, 12, 17]

challenges = gandalf [0] > saruman [0], gandalf [1] > saruman [1], gandalf [2] > saruman [2], gandalf [3] > saruman [3], gandalf [4] > saruman [4], gandalf [5] > saruman [5], gandalf [6] > saruman [6], gandalf [7] > saruman [7], gandalf [8] > saruman [8], gandalf [9] > saruman [9]
print (challenges)

outputs.name: stdout

1st challenge saruman wins challenge
2nd challenge saruman wins challenge
2rd challenge gandalf wins challenge
4th challenge saruman wins challenge
5th challenge gandalf wins challenge
6th challenge gandalf wins challenge
7th challenge saruman wins challenge
8th challenge gandalf wins challenge
9th challenge gandalf wins challenge
10th challenge gandalf wins challenge

saruman wins challenge

source:
gandalf = [10, 11, 13, 30, 22, 11, 10, 33, 22, 22]
saruman = [23, 66, 12, 43, 12, 10, 44, 23, 12, 17]

spells = len (gandalf)
print ("They are", spells, "total spells")

challenges = gandalf [0:10] > saruman [0:10]
print (challenges)

if challenges == False:
    print ("saruman wins challenge")

else:
    print ("gandalf wins challenge")
